title: Beethoven Missa Solemnis (Gardiner Orchestre Revolutionnaire et
description:
Reposted with a new tracker and the old hash (its gone dht).


LUDWIG VAN BEETHOVEN (1770-1827)

MISSA SOLEMNIS
                                                                                                       
for four solo voices, chorus, orchestra and organ in D major, op. 123


1. KYRIE          [8-46]               Assai sostenuto (Mit Andacht)
2. GLORIA         [16-23]              Allegro vivace
3. CREDO          [17-23]              Allegro ma non troppo
4. SANCTUS        [15-06]              Adagio (Mit Andacht)
5. AGNUS DEI      [13-30]              Adagio
 
                           Charlotte Margiono,  soprano
                           Catherine Robbin, mezzo-soprano
                           William Kendall, tenor
                           Alastair Miles, bass

                           THE MONTEVERDI CHOIR
                           (Soprano [12], Alto [8], Tenor [8], Bass [8])


                          ORCHESTRE REVOLUTIONNAIRE ET ROMANTIQUE                                                              
(flute I & II,oboe I & II,clarinet I & II, bassoon I & II, double bassoon, horn I-IV, trumpet 1& II,trombone I-III, timpani, violin I [12], violin II [10], viola [8], violoncello [7], double bass [4], organ)
                          on authentic instruments    
                          Leader : Elizabeth Wilcock
                          Organ: Alastair Ross
                                                
                          Directed by JOHN ELIOT GARDINER


mp3, around 320 kb/s (it varies from file to file)
